icon.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a small sign or picture on a computer screen that is used to start a particular operation
icon.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: To open a new file, click on the icon.
icon.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: someone famous who is admired by many people and is thought to represent an important idea
icon.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a picture or figure of a holy person that is used in worship in the Greek or Russian Orthodox Church

icon.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: First open your File Manager by clicking on the icon.
